posts.title: general-hexo
posts.text: Hexo로 블로깅 하기Hexo 설치hexo https://hexo.io 12345npm install hexo-cli -ghexo init blogcd blognpm installhexo server 브라우져로 http://localhost:4000 열어서 보기 icarus 테마 설치하기123cd blognpm install hexo-theme-icarushexo config theme icarus github에 repository만들기… 블로그 참조 https://velog.io/@recordboy/%ED%97%A5%EC%86%8CHEXO%EB%A5%BC-%EC%9D%B4%EC%9A%A9%ED%95%9C-%EA%B9%83%ED%97%88%EB%B8%8C-%EB%B8%94%EB%A1%9C%EA%B7%B8-%EB%A7%8C%EB%93%A4%EA%B8%B0

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 이미지보여라
posts.text: 이미지 경로는 어디인가toc도 잘나오나와우~~ 이미지는 잘나오나
